extension_name.message: Right Click Opens Link in a Background Tab
extension_name.description: The display name for the extension.

extension_description.message: Right clicking a link opens the link in a new background tab. This extension makes right clicking on links open the link in a new background tab. In short, the same behavior as middle mouse click or Cmd + Click on a link, but for the right mouse button. This makes opening links in new tabs a breeze on modern trackpads, where gestures already allow you to do most navigation operations without ever needing your keyboard.
extension_description.description: Description of what the extension does.
